nodes.documentation:
@notice IMPORTANT: owner should create first game.
@notice CoinFlipGame can be created by creator and run by joined playr. Creator is not required to be online or perform any actions for game to be played.
 *  Prize distribution will be performed on game prize, referral fee, raffle prize withdrawals with percentages:
   95% - winner
    1% - winner referral
    1% - raffle
    1% - partner project
    1% - fee beneficiar
    1% - dev
nodes.name: CoinFlipGame

nodes.documentation:
@notice IMPORTANT: owner should create first game.
@notice CoinFlipGame can be created by creator and run by joined playr. Creator is not required to be online or perform any actions for game to be played.
 *  Prize distribution will be performed on game prize, referral fee, raffle prize withdrawals with percentages:
   95% - winner
    1% - winner referral
    1% - raffle
    1% - partner project
    1% - fee beneficiar
    1% - dev
nodes.name: CoinFlipGame

addTopGame(uint256).details: Add game idx to the beginning of topGames.

params._guessHash: Hash of guess. Coin side should be 0 / 1

getGamesWithPendingPrizeWithdrawalForAdd.details: Return game ids with pending withdrawal for address.

getParticipatedGameIdxsForPlayer(address.details: Get game indexes where player participated. Created and joined

isTopGame(uint256).details: Check if game id is in top games.

returns._0: Whether game id is in top games.

makeFeeBeneficiar().details: Purchase right to become fee beneficiar.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateMinBet(uint256).details: Update minimum bet value. Can be 0 if no restrictions.

updatePartnerTransferThreshold(uint256).details: Updates partner fee transfer threshold limit, when fee should be transferred to address.

params._transferThreshold: Fee amount, that should trigger transfer. TESTED

updateRaffleActivationParticipantsCount(.details: Updates raffle minimum participants count to activate.

userdoc.notice: IMPORTANT: owner should create first game.CoinFlipGame can be created by creator and run by joined playr. Creator is not required to be online or perform any actions for game to be played. *  Prize distribution will be performed on game prize, referral fee, raffle prize withdrawals with percentages:   95% - winner    1% - winner referral    1% - raffle    1% - partner project    1% - fee beneficiar    1% - dev
